column1: Traffic reports will resume Thursday September 14 at 4:00 p.m.

column3: TRAFFIC ALERT FOR RICHMOND RD AT IRVINE RD:
column4: All outbound lanes are shut down until further notice due to a serious collision involving a motorcycle.
